mapper.insert: insert into payment (paycode, userid, totalwage, totalsalary, relate, payday) values (#{payCode},#{userId} ,nvl(#{totalWage, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null) ,nvl(#{totalSalary, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null) ,nvl(#{relate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null) ,to_date( nvl(#{payDay, jdbcType=VARCHAR},null),'yyyyMMdd') )
mapper.select: select paycode, userid, totalwage, totalsalary, relate, payday from payment
select paycode, userid, totalwage, totalsalary, relate, payday from payment where paycode = #{paycode}
select paycode, userid, totalwage, totalsalary, relate, payday from payment where userid = #{userId}
